body: The following feats are either new for the wounds and vigor system or work differently in that system.
name: Wounds and Vigor Variant Feats
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Wounds and Vigor/Wounds and Vigor Variant Feats

sections.body: For you, impending death is a call to wrath.
sections.name: Deathless Initiate
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Wounds and Vigor/Wounds and Vigor Variant Feats/Deathless Initiate

sections.body: Str 13, Con 13, Diehard, Endurance, base attack bonus +6, orc or half-orc.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You are not staggered when your wound points reach your wound threshold, but you lose 1 wound point if you take any action during your turn. You only take 1 wound point each round when you take actions. Furthermore, you gain a +2 bonus on melee attacks and damage rolls when your wound points are at or below your wound threshold.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: Even if you suffer a grievous wound, you can shrug off the damage and continue your relentless assault.
sections.name: Deathless Master
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Wounds and Vigor/Wounds and Vigor Variant Feats/Deathless Master

sections.body: Str 13, Con 15, Deathless Initiate, Diehard, Endurance, Ironhide, base attack bonus +9, orc or half-orc.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When your wound points reach your wound threshold, you do not take 1 wound point when you take an action.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You keep on going, even when your wound points are lower than your wound threshold.
sections.name: Diehard
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Wounds and Vigor/Wounds and Vigor Variant Feats/Diehard

sections.body: When your current wound point total is below your wound threshold, you do not need to succeed at the DC 10 Constitution check to stay conscious.
sections.name: Benefit
Toughness
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Wounds and Vigor/Wounds and Vigor Variant Feats/Toughness

sections.body: You gain 1 wound point for every level or Hit Die your character has.
sections.name: Benefit
